name: Video recorder
description: Record videos of the project or the whole screen in real-time.

conditions.name: On recording ready
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Stop recording' when the recording is available in the RecordingURL expression.

conditions.name: On recording error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs during recording.

conditions.name: Is recording supported
conditions.description: True if the current browser supports video recording.

conditions.name: Is recording
conditions.description: True while actively recording a video.

conditions.name: Is screen recording supported
conditions.description: True if the current browser supports screen recording.

conditions.name: Is video format supported
conditions.description: Check if a particular video format is supported for recording.

params.name: Container
params.description: The container format to test if supported for recording.

params.name: Video codec
params.description: The video codec to test if supported for recording.

conditions.name: Is audio format supported
conditions.description: Check if a particular audio format is supported for recording.

params.name: Container
params.description: The container format to test if supported for recording.

params.name: Audio codec
params.description: The audio codec  to test if supported for recording.

actions.name: Stop recording
actions.description: Finish recording a video. Triggers 'On recording ready' when available.

actions.name: Start recording
actions.description: Record a real-time video of the project.

params.name: Video codec
params.description: The video codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: Framerate
params.description: The frames per second to capture in the video (if used). Use 0 for the display rate.

params.name: Audio codec
params.description: The audio codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: Quality (kbps)
params.description: The data rate to encode in kilobits per second (kbps).

actions.name: Start screen recording
actions.description: Record a real-time video of the user's screen.
actions.display_text: Start screen recording ([i]{0} {1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i], system audio [i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i] kbps)

params.name: Video codec
params.description: The video codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: Audio codec
params.description: The audio codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: System audio
params.description: Check to request recording the entire system's audio output. Otherwise audio may be limited to the tab or Audio object output.

params.name: Quality (kbps)
params.description: The data rate to encode in kilobits per second (kbps).

actions.name: Start User Media recording
actions.description: Record the audio or video from an active User Media object.

params.name: Video codec
params.description: The video codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: Audio codec
params.description: The audio codec to encode the recording with.

params.name: Quality (kbps)
params.description: The data rate to encode in kilobits per second (kbps).

expressions.name: RecordingURL
expressions.description: Return a URL of the recording that can be downloaded with the Browser object.

expressions.name: RecordingType
expressions.description: Return the MIME type of the recording, e.g. "video/webm".

expressions.name: RecordingFileExtension
expressions.description: Return the file extension for the recording, e.g. ".webm".
